attributes.action: make all disabled parking bays in private roads enforceable
attributes.additional_details:
to change the rules surrounding a "curtesy bay"  and to make all disabled bays whether they be in a public or private area enforceable, so that the general public if they do not have a blue badge will recieve a fine payable to the local council.
or to give the private road bays the same rights as those on public roads/areas and they are enforceable by traffic wardens

rejection.details: This is a matter for the land owners concerned.
